attribute.description: The instance to plug into the server peer
attribute.name: Instance

attribute.description: The JNDI name of the DataSource used by this persistence manager
attribute.name: DataSource

attribute.description: The ObjectName of the TransactionManager used by this persistence manager
attribute.name: TransactionManager

attribute.description: Should database tables be created on startup?
attribute.name: CreateTablesOnStartup

attribute.description: Should JDBC batch updates be used?
attribute.name: UsingBatchUpdates

attribute.description: Should binary stream be used for accessing message headers / body ?
attribute.name: UsingBinaryStream

attribute.description: Should a trailing byte be added to VARBINARY columns - this would be true for databases such as Sybase which would otherwise truncate trailing zeros
attribute.name: UsingTrailingByte

attribute.description: The max number of params to be used in a generated PreparedStatement
attribute.name: MaxParams

attribute.description: The period in ms for the reaper to kick in and delete unreferenced messages from the database
attribute.name: ReaperPeriod

attribute.description: Some databases don't support binding blobs on select clauses
attribute.name: SupportsBlobOnSelect
